sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : 1, data : '' } shouldComponentUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { let id = this.props.match.params.vid if(id == undefined) { id = this.state.id } console.log(id) axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data) this.setState({ data : response.data }) }) return true } render() { console.log(this.props.match.params.vid) return (
